definition: (computer science) a system of world-wide electronic communication in which a computer user can compose a message at one terminal that can be regenerated at the recipient's terminal when the recipient logs in, communicate electronically on the computer
details:
noun
- (computer science) a system of world-wide electronic communication in which a computer user can compose a message at one terminal that can be regenerated at the recipient's terminal when the recipient logs in
= synonyms: electronic mail
verb
- communicate electronically on the computer
= synonyms: e-mail
